title: Barros (Diogo de)
body: He was a valiant knight from Madeira, who distinguished himself greatly in our campaigns in Morocco, especially in the capture of Azamor, where he accompanied the fourth captain donatary of Funchal, João Gonçalves da Câmara. (See Barros).

Diogo de Barros: Valiant knight from Madeira, who distinguished himself greatly in our campaigns in Morocco, especially in the capture of Azamor
